modName: Performance Body with New Head Replacement
summary: This is a body replacement originally use mirrored UV in order to reduce texture size and fix some topology issues.However i found serious lighting problem,so i convert it to normal UV assignment
descriptionHtml:
This body replacement doesn't compatible with vanilla head,you have to modify it by yourself or use my head01 resource.The purpose of this body is for performance of game playing and being the base of my future head mesh replacements.(Of course,eyecandy is a key factor!)
I kept polygon count as low as possible and keep breast/animation related area have reasonable polygons to get the maximum compatibility of recent harvok related mods.
The vanilla and other body replacements separate body/hands into 2 different textures.I used additional saved pixel space to combine them,this should save further more ram space.
By these efforts,i hope i can reduce performance impact caused by body replacement when we are playing skyrim with ENB.
I also tried to fix the joint location error of vanilla body,it caused some animation error when character rise arm over shoulders,like tanning leather in crafting area.It's still a bit of distortion,but it should act much better than vanilla one.
I decided not to release my esp file,,because it's still buggy,i don't want spent my time answering question about CK,you can find lots of turorials in the web.
I suggest you use the following 2 mods to maintain the compatibility if you want use this resource to create new playable races.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?
I'm still working on more contents of this body/head,so there must be still lots of problems.
please help me make this project better if you like it.

Knowing issue:
some eyebrow facial expression is still distorted --fixed in version 0.6
still visible head/body seam line.
egt mask textures are not finish yet. --no need this shit in skyrim
Skin tone color tint mask doesn't work on face. --fixed,,it's skyrim's original bug,not my fault.
Add following line in your data/skse/skse.ini .(create it if it's not there)
[Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048

and more....waiting for your report:P

Update note:
updated version 0.6 --see change log
Added Black Rose Armor by N8k
Version 0.5
Return to normal UV assignment,only hands textures are combined.

Version 0.2 beta:
fixed hip/leg angle issue,face normal of legs.
normal map is saved as uncompressed version.
repainted some color.
sculpture the upper arm muscle,it's outline is much softer than 1st version.
updated resource files.
Version 0.1 beta:
First release for testing.
author: barjack

files.name: Resource data files
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed eyebrow animation
Fixed face specularity.added lip/eyeshadow masks.
Fixed some skinning problem in the leg.
Fixed some normal map issues in the body.
Changed body diffuse/specular map size to 4k,to fit the resolution of face map better
Updated Thief Guild Armor version 0.6,make it fit body shape better and use strip to gain some performance boost

files.changelogHtml:
Fixed eyebrow animation
Fixed face specularity.added lip/eyeshadow masks.
Fixed some skinning problem in the leg.
Fixed some normal map issues in the body.
Changed body diffuse/specular map size to 4k,to fit the resolution of face map better
Updated Thief Guild Armor version 0.6,make it fit body shape better and use strip to gain some performance boost
